resources.string: Main developer. Click here for more info.
Need some help or want to share ideas?
Click here to quickly open an issue on GitHub. Remember to follow the template you choose, so that we can act faster and more efficiently.
Could\'t open the link. Is it broken?
If enabled, this will prevent the user from capturing the screen when using NextPass (i.e. screenshots…).
Use your biometric system to authenticate.
You must enable autofill service first
NextPass works on top of Passwords app for Nextcloud. Click here to check it out.
Click here to quickly send us an email. We\'ll get back to you as soon as possible.
Click here to manually terminate the background autofill service. Note that it will automatically restart if you restart NextPass.
The app can automatically lock itself when you\'re not using it. Here you can choose when the app should lock.
NextPass was made possible thanks to the work of many people and some amazing tools. Click here to learn more about them.
If enabled, NextPass will try to detect when you\'re logging into a website or an app and will offer you some suggestions from your own passwords accordingly.
Welcome, NextPass needs a Nextcloud account to work. Please click the button below to login.
The selected folder will be deleted, along with all its content. Do you really want to proceed?
Click here to automatically generate a new random password and copy it to your device\'s clipboard. This action follows your server\'s settings.
If enabled, this will allow NextPass to run a background service as soon as your device boots, in order to provide suggestions automatically without opening the app first.
Protect the app using a PIN code, at least 4-digit long. Click here to modify the current pin.
Do you want to enable it now?
Protect the app using biometric authentication (if supported by the device). PIN authentication must be enabled as fallback.
The app will automatically lock itself when you\'re not using it, according to the setting above. Click here to lock it immediately.
PIN will be changed. Are you sure you want to proceed?
PIN must be at least 4-digit long.
PIN authentication will be disabled. Are you sure you want to proceed?
These changes will be applied and synced on the Nextcloud server. Are you sure you want to proceed?
A new password will be created and synced with your Nextcloud server. Are you sure you want to proceed?
Autofill services expose your credentials to apps and web pages. If you trust the apps you installed, click on \'Confirm\' to enable the autofill service.
You\'re either having connection problems or messing with me…
If enabled, NextPass will show tags to better organize your passwords by default in \'Passwords\', \'Favorites\' and \'Search\' screens, not just in details screens.
If enabled, NextPass will always start in folder mode
Click here to reset your preferences to defaults. This will not log you out from NextPass. If you log out manually, preferences will be reset automatically.
NextPass waits approximately 60 seconds for you to complete login. Time\'s up, try again.
This will reset all your preferences. Are you sure you want to proceed?
This tag will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?
Your Nextcloud account will be disconnected from the app. NextPass will require a new Nextcloud account to work and will reset all the settings. Are you sure you want to proceed?
The password will be deleted. Are you sure you want to proceed?
NextPass could not send the request to the Nextcloud server. Try again.
A new empty folder will be created and synced with your Nextcloud server. Are you sure you want to proceed?
NextPass is powered by Nextcloud. Click here to check it out.
Fields with a red badge are required!
